thread.title: amazing location and incredible staff
thread.title_full: amazing location and incredible staff - Review of Hotel Exposition Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: smbentley2
title: amazing location and incredible staff
text:
our hotel was situated on a quaint street with restaurants nearby. the rooms were small but comfortable. It was quiet and the beds were comfortable. Breakfast was amazing and the staff was very helpful with directions and scheduling shuttles to the airport. The metro is close but RER train is about a 10-15 walk. Right by the Eiffel tower. The metro is very easy, safe and clean. It was a wonderful experience.
Room Tip: All rooms were great . we were facing the street, but it is a quiet street with windows that open. See more room tips
